\w Praise|strong="H1984"\w* ye the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3050"\+w*
d*. \w Blessed|strong="H0835"\w* \add is\add* the \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \add that\add* \w feareth|strong="H3372"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, \add that\add* \w delighteth|strong="H2654"\w* \w greatly|strong="H3966"\w* in his \w commandments|strong="H4687"\w*.  +  r 112.1  t Praiseâ€¦: Heb. Hallelujah *

His \w seed|strong="H2233"\w* shall be \w mighty|strong="H1368"\w* upon \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*: the \w generation|strong="H1755"\w* of the \w upright|strong="H3477"\w* shall be \w blessed|strong="H1288"\w*.

\w Wealth|strong="H1952"\w* and \w riches|strong="H6239"\w* \add shall be\add* in his \w house|strong="H1004"\w*: and his \w righteousness|strong="H6666"\w* \w endureth|strong="H5975"\w* for \w ever|strong="H5703"\w*.

Unto the \w upright|strong="H3477"\w* there \w ariseth|strong="H2224"\w* \w light|strong="H0216"\w* in the \w darkness|strong="H2822"\w*: \add he is\add* \w gracious|strong="H2587"\w*, and full of \w compassion|strong="H7349"\w*, and \w righteous|strong="H6662"\w*.

A \w good|strong="H2896"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* sheweth \w favour|strong="H2603"\w*, and \w lendeth|strong="H3867"\w*: he will \w guide|strong="H3557"\w* his \w affairs|strong="H1697"\w* with \w discretion|strong="H4941"\w*.\f + \fr 112.5 \ft discretion: Heb. judgment\f*
Surely he shall not be \w moved|strong="H4131"\w* for \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*: the \w righteous|strong="H6662"\w* shall be in \w everlasting|strong="H5769"\w* \w remembrance|strong="H2143"\w*.

He shall not be \w afraid|strong="H3372"\w* of \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* \w tidings|strong="H8052"\w*: his \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* is \w fixed|strong="H3559"\w*, \w trusting|strong="H0982"\w* in the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

His \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* \add is\add* \w established|strong="H5564"\w*, he shall not be \w afraid|strong="H3372"\w*, until he \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \add his desire\add* upon his \w enemies|strong="H6862"\w*.

He hath \w dispersed|strong="H6340"\w*, he hath \w given|strong="H5414"\w* to the \w poor|strong="H0034"\w*; his \w righteousness|strong="H6666"\w* \w endureth|strong="H5975"\w* for \w ever|strong="H5703"\w*; his \w horn|strong="H7161"\w* shall be \w exalted|strong="H7311"\w* with \w honour|strong="H3519"\w*.

The \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w* shall \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \add it\add*, and be \w grieved|strong="H3707"\w*; he shall \w gnash|strong="H2786"\w* with his \w teeth|strong="H8127"\w*, and melt \w away|strong="H4549"\w*: the \w desire|strong="H8378"\w* of the \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w* shall \w perish|strong="H0006"\w*.
